conbody.p: (b) The Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Logistics and Technology), on a non-delegable basis, shall designate a central printing authority as set forth in FAR 8.802(b).

(1) Printing Equipment, specifically, Unclassified and Secret-level printing devices purchased or leased with federal funds appropriated to the Army, shall be procured through DLA Document Services using its Equipment Management Solutions Portal () as described in AFARS (a)(3)(v)(D), Army CIO memorandum Army Procurement or Lease of Printing Devices and Services, dated 17 November 2023, and DODI 5330.03 Single Manager of DoD Document Services.
